section.heading: Selection of jury; oath of jurors.
section.text: In each action brought pursuant to this subchapter, the court shall appoint, from among the persons whose names are drawn pursuant to section 16-1312 , a jury of five capable and disinterested persons, and shall administer to the persons so drawn an oath or affirmation that they:

para.text: are not interested in any manner in the real property to be condemned;
are not related to the parties interested in the property; and
without favor or partiality, and to the best of their judgment, will appraise the value of the respective interests of all persons concerned in the property.
